game.name: Aeschylus: Death
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Die. Fight your way back to life. Save the world. After his death, Aeschylus unintentionally stumbles into an adventure that leads him on a path back to life. Dodge traps on the path, use the weapons you find to defeat hordes of monsters and fight powerful boss monsters.
